00036

00039 #define KVSCCC_pSwitches __pSwitches

00044 #define KVSCCC_PARAMETERS_BEGIN \
00045         KVS_PARAMETERS_BEGIN(parameter_format_list)
00046 
00047 #define KVSCCC_PARAMETERS_END \
00048         KVS_PARAMETERS_END \
00049         if(!KviKvsParameterProcessor::process(KVSCCC_pParams,KVSCCC_pContext,parameter_format_list))return false;
00050 
00051 #define KVSCCC_REQUIRE_CONNECTION \
00052         if(!KVSCCC_pContext->window()->context())return KVSCCC_pContext->errorNoIrcContext(); \
00053         if(!KVSCCC_pContext->window()->connection())return KVSCCC_pContext->warningNoIrcConnection();
00054 
00055 #define KVSCCC_pWindow __pContext->window()
00056 #define KVSCCC_pConnection __pContext->window()->connection()
00057 #define KVSCCC_pIrcContext __pContext->context()
